Business languages: French, English & Spanish   
 
Global  Sales, Marketing & Business Development Leader  
MedTech, High -Tech Solutions  & Services  
“Driving transformational growth, innovation, and operational excellence ” 
• Growth: Delivering double -digit growth in competitive markets through innovative market strategies and operational excellence  
• Leadership : Building and developing high-performance global teams  
• Strategy : Identifying new business opportunities , commercializing disruptive technologies  and launching new solutions  
• P&L: Strong financial acumen with a proven track record of P&L management driving profitability and sustainable growth  
• MedTech , Digital Health & High -Tech Solutions : Growing businesses in start -up, scale -up, turnaround and M&A contexts  
 
since 09/2022  Occlutech, Schaffhausen, Switzerland  
Leading specialist provider of minimally invasive cardiac devices  with global sales in +80 countries  
Executive Vice President of Global Marketing & Business Development  
Leadi ng Global Marketing and Business Development of a global leading specialist provider in cardiac devices, addressing 
congenital heart defects, stroke prevention and heart failure , ExCom member reporting to Occlutech CEO  
• Building up and developing a 25 FTEs team in charge of upstream/ downstream Product Marketing, Communication, Training 
& Education, Business Development, Market Access (Health Economics & Reimbursement), and Project management (PMO)  
• Achieving +20% annual revenue growth  in a low -growth , mature market  by driving marketing programs to expand therapy 
adoption and increase market share  (+5% in two years) , turning around a flat revenue and declining market share trend  
• Spearhead ing the US market launch, the ANZ footprint  rationalization , and the direct market entry in Poland  
• Defin ing and execut ing a robust innovation strategy to drive new product development and portfolio expansion with R&D, 
CMO and Sales, including new products innovation, indications expansion, partnerships and M&A deals  
• Leading  the corporate strategy , branding, communication, and investors relations in coordination with the CEO and CFO  
2009  - 2022  
 
2017  – 2022
 Medtronic , Lausanne, Switzerland  
Global leader in Medical Devices technology , solutions,  and services  
Senior Director - Strategic Marketing, Cardiac Surgery & Structural Heart Division, EMEA  
Leadi ng the Strategic & Digital Solutions Marketing in the EMEA region, driving strategy and business development for the 
$750m cardiovascular business , reporting line SVP EMEA  
• Generating +$20m per year and protecting Medtronic devices share through launching new digital solutions and business 
models, and through identifying and negotiating innovative strategic IT partnerships  
• Overperforming market growth & capturing market leadership through devising and rolling -out Market Development 
programs which help hospitals to drive Value Based Healthcare, therapy pathway efficiency, quality of care, free up capacity, 
optimize the patient journey, and increase referrals  
• Defining and implementing marketing and sales initiatives to address Strategic Accounts, GPOs & hospital groups, including 
Portfolio strategy, Commercial Business Analytics & Intelligence, Sales Force Effectiveness, go to Market and multi- channel 
marketing  (congresses, social media)  
• Developing M&A strategy and leading due diligence of the strategic acquisition and integration plan of a €30m business  
2012 – 2016
 Senior Director  - Congenital Therapies Europe  
Responsible for European Sales & Marketing of the $ 50m Congenital Therapies business, leading 1 5 FTE s in charge of sales, 
marketing, and customers training, reporting to Sr. Business Director SH Europe  
• Doubling turnover within 4 yea

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
